member.name: M:ReviewNotifier.Mango.ReviewNotification.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize the ReviewNotifier helper by increasing the startup counter. To be placed in the Application_Launching event in App.xaml.cs

member.name: M:ReviewNotifier.Mango.ReviewNotification.Trigger(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Trigger the ReviewNotifier helper. A message will be displayed with the passed title and message text after 5 app launches.
member.param: The message text of the message pop-up to be displayed to the user
The title of the message pop-up to be displayed to the user

member.name: M:ReviewNotifier.Mango.ReviewNotification.Trigger(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Trigger the ReviewNotifier helper. A message will be displayed with the passed title and message text after the specified number of app launches.
member.param: The message text of the message pop-up to be displayed to the user
The title of the message pop-up to be displayed to the user
The number of app launches before displaying the message pop-up
